name: Remove all Materials
function:
def sna_remove_all_materials_FE36B(Collection):
    for i_7B94D in range(len(Collection)):
        if (Collection[i_7B94D].type == 'MESH'):
            obs = Collection[i_7B94D]
            # Get the selected object
            obj = obs
            # Clear the material
            obj.data.materials.clear()
            
        if (Collection[i_7B94D].type == 'CURVE'):
            obs = Collection[i_7B94D]
            # Get the selected object
            obj = obs
            # Clear the material
            obj.data.materials.clear()
            
        if (Collection[i_7B94D].type == 'META'):
            obs = Collection[i_7B94D]
            # Get the selected object
            obj = obs
            # Clear the material
            obj.data.materials.clear()
            
        if (Collection[i_7B94D].type == 'FONT'):
            obs = Collection[i_7B94D]
            # Get the selected object
            obj = obs
            # Clear the material
            obj.data.materials.clear()
            
    return
